arts.sum: The ongoing injury crisis continues to trouble FC Barcelona as Hansi Flick prepares for a crucial UEFA Champions League match against Olympiacos. With several key players unavailable, the German coach faces yet another selection dilemma at a critical point in the season. arts.ttl: Three talking points ahead of Barcelona vs Olympiacos | UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Barcelona play host to Olympiacos, the Greek footballing giants, on Tuesday night at Montjuic as part of Matchday 3 of the UEFA Champions League’s league stage. arts.ttl: Barcelona suffer new blow as 29-year-old player sent home with illness ahead of Olympiacos game
arts.sum: The start of the 2025-26 season has not really been easy for FC Barcelona as they have had to contend with injuries to several of their important players, including the likes of Robert Lewandowski, Lamine Yamal, Raphinha, Fermin Lopez, Gavi, Dani Olmo, Alejandro Balde, and Joan Garcia. arts.ttl: Olympiacos coach hails Barcelona midfielder ahead of UCL clash – “Makes you forget Xavi, Iniesta”
arts.sum: Olympiacos coach Jose Luis Mendilibar is no stranger to facing Barcelona, having registered a woeful record against the Catalan side during the course of his coaching career. But he will be looking to move past that record when Olympiacos take on a struggling Barcelona team in the Champions League this midweek.
